Mother's Decisive Power in Her Home.--Would that every mother could realize how great are her duties and her responsibilities, 
                                                                           1009
and how great will be the reward of faithfulness. The mother's daily influence upon her children is preparing them for everlasting life or eternal death. She exercises in her home a power more decisive than the minister in the desk, or even the king upon his throne (ST Nov. 3, 1881).
